medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began 3 days ago, initially attributed to excessive exercise and sit-ups. The pain started first and has worsened over time. Patient experienced diarrhea with two episodes of looser bowel movements yesterday. Reports nausea without vomiting. Currently, the cramps are worse than before.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Hypothyroidism, dry eyes; past surgical history includes C-section, D&C x2, knee surgery, L wrist surgery.
medical_history.family_history: No colorectal cancer or inflammatory bowel disease (IBD); sister may have had gallbladder problems.
